alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:53PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Huerfano and west central Las Animas Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 149 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms developing near the Spanish Peaks in northwestern Las Animas and southern Huerfano Counties. Movement of individual cells were northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Spring Burn Scar south of Highway 160 in Huerfano county, eastern Spring Burn Scar north of Highway 160, Walsenburg, La Veta, Aguilar, Gulnare, Spanish Peaks and Cuchara Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
